summary: Mystery surrounds the death of thousands of pigeons on the Bhimeshwor temple premises in the past week. According to the people in  Dolakha  Bazaar, dead pigeons are lying on the streets, rooftops, gardens and paddy fields. “Approximately 5,000 pigeons have died in a week,” said Bharat Shrestha, treasurer of the Bhimeshwor temple prayer and trust management committee. “Such cases happened in the past but the damage this time is terrible,” said temple caretaker Kashi Narayan Shrestha.
title: mystery-as-pigeons-die-in-flocks
